TEDx IITH Talks

Nominate yourself for the speaker
We are looking for diverse, expressive, inventive speakers with ideas in sync with our theme; Let’s Play (Un)Safe! Do you know someone who might be a potential speaker? Nominate them and let us know.

Read more
Why Partner with us?
TEDxIITHyderabad connects individuals and organizations who share the common goal of fostering remarkable thinking and powerful ideas.When you partner with us, you partner with a worldwide audience that can change the world for the better. Through an individually tailored TEDx partnership, we look forward to welcoming you into our global community of leaders.

This independent TEDx event is operated under lisence from TED.
